name: Don't drop the princess !
description:
Game made for the trijam 133 with the theme don't drop it.

The game and the visual assets were made by myself in 4 hours and 28 minutes. The sound effects and the music are copyright free assets. 

The knight and the princess have been ambused by monsters ! Take the role of the knight and protect the princess at all cost ! You cannot fight with the princess in your arms so throw her in the sky while you fight, just don't forget to catch her when she fall !

The difficulty increase until your reach 21 points, but good luck ! Since it was made for a trijam I dind't had the time to balance the difficulty.  

Controls : 
Left click : Attack
A/D or left and right arrows : Move

Credits : 
All sounds effects are from Juhani Junkala who made the excellent Retro video game sounds effects collection that you can find here : https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
The only sound effect not from him is the princess scream that you can find here : https://freesound.org/people/claracarpintero/sounds/219856/
The music is The only me is me by three chains links, here is the link :
